text:
On copy, ant broken GIF files

<filter filtersfile="${src}/build/${paramsfilename}"/>
    <copy todir="${localdist}" filtering="true">
	    <fileset dir="${src}">
	    	      <exclude name="build/"/>	
		      <exclude name="**/vssver.scc"/>
		      <exclude name="**/*.bak"/>
	    </fileset>
</copy>	

Workarround:
First copy files(filtering on) without GIF extension ,then 
copy GIF files with option filtering off

You are absolutely correct - and the workaround is the solution at the same time.

In order to do the filtering, Ant treats all files as text files, you tell it
which files are binary and should not be filtered, by simply excluding them from
the filelist.
